It could be that the browser is too scary as it gestures strongly in the direction of ‚Äòthe web‚Äô and content out ‚Äòin the wild‚Äô. It could be that all of this triggers challenges we don‚Äôt want to consider ‚Äì challenges to current business models, the status value of the book, professional pride, roles, and infrastructure. Whatever it is, I am sure it‚Äôs there; legacy ideas that prevent us from understanding what is actually going on, from understanding that an EPUB is nothing special.We could perhaps clarify this by calling EPUB a standard for ‚Äòportable websites‚Äô and stop talking about books altogether.

Tunnel down the folders to Payload > iPhoneMissingManual.app and extract the file singlebook.epub. 4.
